lead_paragraph: Washington Redskins receiver Santana Moss is not expected to play tomorrow against Dallas because of an injured left hamstring. Moss, who was injured in a loss Sunday to the Indianapolis Colts, has more receiving yards (435) than the team’s other four wideouts combined (397).
